name: Ebay Dark Wood
description:
This is a hack of Ebay Dark and Youtube Dark Gray Wood background with some help from Ebay Black Redesign and Doom Ebay. 

Thanks to original authors, no ownership implied. 

I'm getting a little better at this.

When creating the script, it says it will auto-generate the screenshots, but this doesn't seem to be the case. will look into this eventually.

discussions.name: best & most complete ebay dark theme
